TopicTitle: Idea - Request LandRover dropship and Hoverbot Drone -kOS

Articles.Content:
Hello, i've watched some youtube videos and there was a drone that is scripted by kOS to do drop stuff, self adjusting thrust, following rovers over etc.

Despite those were good content, i couldn't have access to get them because they've been uploaded 2 years ago or something. I want to start and build for myself but it will take too long because of learning scripting from scratch.

(if i can get the script, i might be able to adjust it to build dropship for my taste and i can share it to public.

So if anyone has source code of those kOS script vehicles , would you please share it again ?

 

here is the video for hoverbot and dead download link from reddit;
